verses.roman:
sa ca śambaram abhyetya
saṁyugāya samāhvayat
aviṣahyais tam ākṣepaiḥ
kṣipan sañjanayan kalim

synonyms: saḥ—He; ca—and; śambaram—Śambara; abhyetya—approaching; saṁyugāya—to battle; samāhvayat—called him; aviṣahyaiḥ—intolerable; tam—him; ākṣepaiḥ—with insults; kṣipan—reviling; sañjanayan—inciting; kalim—a fight.
translation: Pradyumna approached Śambara and called him to battle, hurling intolerable insults at him to foment a conflict.
